import.desc: You can import a CSV file to the MySK database. Please ensure that the columns in your CSV file match the following exactly.

generateClasses.title: Generate classes
generateClasses.desc: Automatically generate a whole academic year of classes with this tool.

numClasses.title: Classes per grade
numClasses.instructions: Enter the amount of classes you would like in each grade. For example, if you want the classes <0>M.101, M.102, M.103</0>, enter “3” inside the field labeled “Num. of classes in M.1”.
